direct_enhancements.reason: Both methods modify the class attribute of an element, but in opposite ways.
Both methods manipulate the class attribute, but toggleClass adds or removes based on presence.
Both methods involve modifying attributes of an element, though attr is more general.
Both methods change the state of the element, though text modifies the text content.

enhanced_by.reason: Initializes the attributes of the element, which is a prerequisite for modifying class attributes.
Validates the class names before adding them to the element.
Verifies the class attribute after modification to ensure correctness.
